title: Senior Software Engineer
summary: Currently, I am a fullstack developer specializing in scalable and distributed services development, with a focus on domain-driven designs and implementations. My experience includes designing project architecture workflows, implementing CI/CD pipelines, and integrating frontend, backend, and AWS services.
highlights: Led 8-member teams to deliver multilingual applications across 5 regions
Developed data analytics products and automated pipelines driving business growth
Designed and maintained distributed systems on Kubernetes with microservices architecture
Built AWS/GCP solutions enabling cross-team collaboration and high performance
Implemented comprehensive CI/CD workflows and infrastructure automation
